<% }else { %>
<%= payments.at(i).get('name') %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(payments.at(i).get('amount')) %>
<% } if (payments.at(i).get('paymentData')) { var pinfo = payments.at(i).get('paymentData'); %>
<%= OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_PaymentTran') %> <%= pinfo.TransactionID %>
